summary: Medication list/report: support toggling discontinued meds, allow re-activating discontinued meds, and when the toggle is on place Physician's Name and signature on the last page after the medications list.

existing_features.title: Add a frontend React Query mutation hook for re-activating discontinued medications and ensure relevant queries are invalidated after success.
Add a UI action/button on each discontinued medication entry to re-activate it (visible only for users who can edit), and wire it to the re-activation mutation with a confirmation prompt.

When the physician signature toggle is ON, render the Physician Name and Physician Signature fields at the end of the printed report after the medication list, instead of within the Physicians section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a UI button/action to re-activate discontinued medications.
When the discontinued-meds toggle is ON, move Physician's Name and signature to the last page after the medications list.
